items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your hands on your hips.
Take a big step to the right with your right foot, keeping your left foot in place.
Bend your right knee and lower your body down into a lunge, keeping your left leg straight.
Push off your right foot and return to the starting position.
Repeat on the other side, taking a big step to the left with your left foot and bending your left knee while keeping your right leg straight.
Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions or time.
Targets the glutes, quads, hamstrings, and inner thighs
Engages the core muscles for added strength and stability
Can be modified for different fitness levels by adjusting the height of the elevation
Elevated Side Lunge with Knee Drive
Elevated Side Lunge with Calf Raise
